eps_rev_3m.description: 3-month change in forward EPS consensus, standardized by sector

quality_roic.description: Return on invested capital, latest fiscal quarter

news_sent.description: 7-day trailing mean news sentiment score, normalized −1…1

liq_adv.description: log of 30-day average dollar volume, z-scored

def_stability.description: inverse 90-day earnings volatility; higher = more stable

notes: Risk-on regime favors momentum, EPS revision, and liquidity.
Moderate weights on quality and sentiment; slight penalty to beta.
New deterministic stubs to be added for EPS revisions and sentiment.
